Instruction: Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions.
Crumble tofu into a large bowl.
Squeeze excess water from spinach and add to tofu.
Add ricotta cheese, nutritional yeast, salt, and pepper to the tofu and spinach mixture.
Saut√© chopped onion and garlic in olive oil until softened.
Spread a layer of marinara sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Layer lasagna noodles, tofu mixture, and marinara sauce, repeating layers as needed.
Top with mozzarella and Parmesan cheese.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until bubbly and golden brown.
Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.
